name: Showers Pass Crosspoint Flip-Mitts - Unisex
description: Keep your hands warm without sacrificing dexterity. A unique magnetic gasket closure system seals out the elements, then allows you to open the mitt clamshell-style when you need your fingers to hunt for snacks in your jersey pocket.Nylon shell with a waterproof-breathable membrane.Warm, lightweight synthetic insulation.Comfy merino wool lining.Mitt opens to allow quick access to fingers, ideal for snacking, device use and any task requiring dexterity.Innovative magnetic gasket closure.Grippy rubberized palm.Reflective lining.As of 2020 Showers Pass is Climate Neutral certified, meaning they fully offset their carbon emissions. Climate Neutral certified is a consumer label that's carried by brands who take responsibility for greenhouse gas emissions generated in production, operation and shipping of  their goods and services.
